opennlp.ccg.ngrams
Class NgramScorer

java.lang.Object
  opennlp.ccg.ngrams.NgramScorer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Reversible, FeatureExtractor, SignScorer
Direct Known Subclasses:
FactoredNgramModel, FactoredNgramModelFamily, KenNgramModel, LinearNgramScorerCombo, NgramPrecisionModel, SRILMNgramModel, StandardNgramModel
public abstract class NgramScorer
extends Object
implements SignScorer, Reversible, FeatureExtractor

Super class for n-gram scoring models.

Version:
$Revision: 1.37 $, $Date: 2010/02/25 22:26:11 $
Author:
Michael White

score

public double score(Sign sign,
                    boolean complete)
Returns a score between 0 (worst) and 1 (best) for the given sign and completeness flag, based on the n-gram score of the sign's words. If the sign is complete, sentence delimiters are added before scoring the words, if not already present. Returns 0 if any filter flags the n-gram for filtering, or if the sign has no words. Otherwise, sets signToScore, calls prepareToScoreWords, and then returns the result of logprob() converted to a probability.

Specified by:
score in interface SignScorer

logprob

public double logprob(Sign sign,
                      boolean complete)
Returns a log prob for the given sign and completeness flag, based on the n-gram log prob of the sign's words. If the sign is complete, sentence delimiters are added before scoring the words, if not already present. Returns the log prob for zero probability if any filter flags the n-gram for filtering, or if the sign has no words. Otherwise, sets signToScore, calls prepareToScoreWords, and then returns the result of logProb().

score

public double score(List<Word> words)
Returns an n-gram probability from the given list of words, by converting the result of the logprob method.

logprob

public double logprob(List<Word> words)
Returns an n-gram log prob for the given list of words. This method is a simplified version of scoring a sign's words that does not cache results, filter n-grams or ever add sentence delimiters.

shareWordsToScore

protected void shareWordsToScore(List<Word> wordsToScore)
Sets wordsToScore to the given list, for sharing purposes.

setWordsToScore

protected void setWordsToScore(List<Word> words,
                               boolean complete)
Resets wordsToScore to the given ones, reversing them when the reverse flag is true, and adding sentence delimiters if not already present, when the completeness flag is true. Also sets the tagsAdded flag.

prepareToScoreWords

protected void prepareToScoreWords()
Optional step to do further preparation before scoring words.

extractFeatureMap

public FeatureMap extractFeatureMap(Sign sign,
                                    boolean complete)
Returns a feature map with counts of each ngram for the given sign and completness flag.

extractLogProbs

public FeatureVector extractLogProbs(Sign sign,
                                     boolean complete)
Returns a feature vector with the log prob features for the given sign and completeness flag. The default implementation returns the log prob as the value of a feature named '$ngram' plus the counts of each ngram.

extractFeatures

public FeatureVector extractFeatures(Sign sign,
                                     boolean complete)
Returns the features for the given sign and completeness flag. The default implementation returns the log prob as the value of a feature named '$ngram' plus the counts of each ngram.

Specified by:
extractFeatures in interface FeatureExtractor

incNgrams

protected void incNgrams(FeatureMap featmap,
                         int i,
                         int order)
Increments ngram counts for the ngrams starting at the given index in wordsToScore and with the given order. The default implementation uses ngram(i, order).

ngram

protected List<String> ngram(int i,
                             int order)
Returns a list of feature keys for the ngram starting at the given index in wordsToScore and with the given order, using the keys in keysList after setting them appropriately with setKeysToNgram; returns null if this operation does not succeed normally.

logprob

protected double logprob()
Returns a log prob for the words in wordsToScore. The default method returns the log prob of the word sequence as determined by this language model's logProbFromNgram method. The probabilities for the first n-1 words are backed off to the lower order probabilities. If the tagsAdded flag is false, the cache is checked to see whether the log prob of the words of signToScore's initial sign has already been calculated, and at the end the log prob of signToScore's words is stored in the cache.

logProbFromNgram

protected abstract float logProbFromNgram(int i,
                                          int order)
Returns the log prob of the ngram starting at the given index in wordsToScore and with the given order, with backoff.

setKeysToNgram

protected boolean setKeysToNgram(int i,
                                 int order)
Sets the keys in keysList to hold the ngram starting at the given index in wordsToScore and with the given order; returns true if the operation succeeds normally. The default implementation invokes logProbFromNgram, and returns false if the log prob is zero.

setNgramFeatures

public void setNgramFeatures(boolean useNgramFeatures)
Sets the the flag for using ngrams as features.

isReplacementSemClass

protected boolean isReplacementSemClass(String semClass)
Returns whether the given semantic class is a replacement one.

semClassReplacement

protected String semClassReplacement(Word w)
Returns the semantic class replacement value (the semantic class uppercased and interned) for the given word, if apropos, otherwise null.

addTrieMapChildren

protected void addTrieMapChildren(List<Object> prefix,
                                  List<Object> keys,
                                  List<TrieMap<Object,NgramScorer.NgramFloats>> children)
Adds the TrieMap children, with their keys, under the given prefix, then resets the lists.

getNode

protected TrieMap<Object,NgramScorer.NgramFloats> getNode(int pos,
                                                          int len)
Returns the TrieMap node for the given sublist of keysList.

logProb

protected float logProb(int pos,
                        int len)
Returns the log prob (base 10) of the given sublist of keysList, with backoff, or -99 if not found.

backoffWeight

protected float backoffWeight(int pos,
                              int len)
Returns the back-off weight (log base 10) of the given sublist of keysList, or 0 if not found.

rankOrderCentroidWeights

public static double[] rankOrderCentroidWeights(int length)
Returns the rank order centroid weights for a ranked list of the given length. The weights go from highest to lowest, and sum to 1.

convertToProb

public static double convertToProb(double logProb)
Converts a base 10 log prob to an actual probability, checking for -99 (not found).

convertToLogProb

public static double convertToLogProb(double prob)
Converts a probability to a base 10 log prob, returning -99 if zero.

convertToPPL

public static double convertToPPL(double logProb)
Converts a base 10 log prob to the corresponding perplexity.

Sets up tokenizer for reading in language models.
